Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Name of the network analyzer configuration

type.description: Name of the network analyzer configuration

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the new resource

type.description: The description of the new resource

properties.name: TraceContent
properties.description: Trace content for your wireless gateway and wireless device resources

type.description: Trace content for your wireless gateway and wireless device resources

properties.name: WirelessDevices
properties.description: List of wireless gateway resources that have been added to the network analyzer configuration

type.description: List of wireless gateway resources that have been added to the network analyzer configuration

properties.name: WirelessGateways
properties.description: List of wireless gateway resources that have been added to the network analyzer configuration

type.description: List of wireless gateway resources that have been added to the network analyzer configuration

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Arn for network analyzer configuration, Returned upon successful create.

type.description: Arn for network analyzer configuration, Returned upon successful create.
